planner_payload.notes: Implement minimal, behavior-preserving lint fixes: (1) merge split f-string in backend/app/sqlalchemy_py313_compat.py; (2) simplify signal update in frontend/src/app/lib/forms/signal-forms.ts by passing updater directly. Use repo lint scripts if present, avoid dependency/config changes, and keep diffs minimal.
planner_payload.tests:
Backend: `cd backend && pytest -q` | Lint (pick what's configured): `cd backend && ruff check .` or `flake8`.
Frontend: `cd frontend && npm test -- --watch=false` | Lint: `cd frontend && npm run lint`.
Optional build: `cd frontend && npm run build`.
